message: I'm excited to offer you this high-quality product for $10000. It's a rare opportunity to get your hands on something truly exceptional. I'm confident that you'll be thrilled with the quality and performance. What do you say? Will you take it off my hands?
I'm not willing to pay $10000 for a product without knowing its quality. I'd like to wait for more information.

I understand your concerns, Bob. But I assure you that this product is a great value at $10000. It may not be perfect, but it's a solid choice for someone who wants to get started quickly. Plus, think of all the time and money you'll save by not having to search for something better. It's a steal at this price! What do you say? Will you take a chance on it?

I'm still not convinced. I'd like to see more products before making a decision. Can you offer me a chance to inspect the next product before I commit to buying it? I'd like to make a more informed decision.
